roles.title: Software Engineer Coop
bullets: Full-stack development of the role-based access control service at Trifacta with React and Spring, providing resource control and sharing of resources
Developed user and group management pages for Trifacta workspaces
Built cross migration system to maintain data parity between databases

roles.title: Software Engineer Coop
bullets: Developer for scalable distributed web scraping platform to gather and clean competitor product and catalog information built off the Scrapy framework
Built spiders and spider middlewares to crawl web pages, APIs, and sitemaps for over a dozen competitors
Prototyped a Flask and React web app to allow stakeholders to monitor spiders and control crawling schedules

roles.title: Algorithms & Data Structures TA
bullets: Lead office hours and recitations on how common algorithms and data structures work and how to design and reason about algorithms
Graded homework, assessments, and algorithm implementations in python

roles.title: Fundamentals of Computer Science Tutor
bullets: Lead labs and office ours introducing principles of program design
Grading homework modules in Racket, tests, and quizzes

roles.title: Software Engineer Coop
bullets: Fullstack developer for Kivy desktop application allowing researchers to configure, run, and analyze lab experiments
Worked with OpenCV computer vision pipeline for analyzing bacterial motion
Developed hardware management API to coordinate various flow systems, high precision cameras, function generators, and oscilloscopes
